Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Holy Family at the right with the Virgin holding up Christ, while a chorus of angels sing and dance to entertain them; after Anthony van Dyck Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Schelte Adamsz. Bolswert
Published by: Maarten van den Enden
Curator's comments: For another impression of this plate see also R,2.15. With variations after the painting by Anthony van Dyck and Cornelis de Vos in the Hermitage, St Petersburg; another version is in the Palazzo Pitti, Florence.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (168) (Bolswert)
New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (544.II) (Van Dyck)
